thread.title: Toys ‘R’ Us to Close About 180 U.S. Stores This Year

author: WSJ Staff
title: Toys ‘R’ Us to Close About 180 U.S. Stores This Year

organizations.name: u.s. stores this year toys ‘r’ us inc.

text:
Toys ‘R’ Us Inc. is closing about 20% of its U.S. stores, affecting about 4,500 workers, following a disappointing holiday season overshadowed by the retailer’s bankruptcy and operational missteps online and in stores.
The big box chain is closing 182 Toys ‘R’ Us or Babies ‘R’ Us stores over the next few months, shrinking its store base at a time when more customers shop online. Most will close by mid-April.
